channel.title: Vps problem installing java/jdk!
channel.description:
I bought a centOS 6 64-bit, i wanna run my 728 rsps on it,and im following this guide http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/tutorials/309503-running-rsps-centos-linux.html
now im stuck at the java part,i downloaded jdk 7u6 for linux,but its not a .bin file because i cant find it, i uploaded it to the root of the vps,and when i type the install code,it says: no such file or directory.
help please :/
